newsitem.title: INDONESIA: Indonesian palm oil steady on tight supply.
newsitem.headline: Indonesian palm oil steady on tight supply.

text.p: Indonesian palm olein prices were steady on Friday as tight supply in the domestic market continued, traders said.
They said ready palm olein remained at 1,550-60 rupiah/kg in Jakarta and Surabaya and at 1,460 rupiah in Medan.
"The trend is still on the upside as the supply remains tight. We might have to import from Malaysia if traders keep exporting olein in the wake of low export tax," one trader said.
Traders said no crude palm oil tender was heard on Friday morning. A tender of 2,000 tonnes of crude palm oil was sold at 1,215 rupiah/kg on Thursday, compared with 1,175 rupiah/kg on Tuesday.
